name: Vritra Magistus
text: Target 1 Level 4 or lower "Magistus" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If a "Magistus" card(s) in your Spell & Trap Zone would be destroyed by an opponent's card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only use each effect of "Vritra Magistus" once per turn.
